original_text: Then he set it before them, and they ate and had some left over, according to the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 그가 그들 앞에 주었더니 여호와께서 말씀하신 대로 먹고 남았더라

sentences.original_text: Then he set it before them
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그가 그것을 그들 앞에 놓았고

sentences.original_text: according to the word of the Lord
